item.tibw: nyon mongs tshogs bcom mgon po khyod mchod
ting 'dzin ji bzhin rig cing gzigs shing 'dzin
dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi
dge bshes peng ge bre re khyer
dug gsum bdud kun myur du bb+tu nus su
phyogs bcu'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod
phyogs bcu'i lha la phyag 'tshal bsdod
bkra shis bde legs thob par shog
bcol pa'i phyin las 'grub üar mdzod
bde men ye shs che ske gter de dbed
btsun 'jung chung chung bu chung khur
bsod nams phun sum tsshogs pa'i bkra shis shog
bon po sngon po gos sngon po
bla ma sangs rgyas rin po che
tshe ring lo brgya lon par shog
tshogs bsag pa dang sdig pa sbyang ba
rdo rje dpal ldan tshul khrims
lo tsA ba dang paN+Di ta
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
sangs rgyas skyongs kyis mdzad pa'i
seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa'i
